page.title: 18Clubs in Hannington
page.content: We have many clubs in Hannington, all of whom meet in the wooden village hall, which they hire from the Village hall Committee. The W.I. meet monthly with an average membership of 15. This is one of the first established W.I's, having been formed in 1918. Our Playgroup called the 'Ten 0'clock Club', meet twice weekly and averages 12 children supervised by a PPA member & a Mother-helper. This is for the two years to four years of age. The Keep- Fit Class, is for both young & mature, averages 8 members and meet weekly in the evenings. Our Table Tennis Club is for the 8 to 16 years of age, who meet weekly and have an average membership of 10 plus, They enjoy entering local tournaments. Each club has one representative on the Village Hall Management Committee.
